rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0001
rows.name: What is[ST:wide ]― How did[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0002
rows.name:
Could that one Vasalt really have defeated
all these Simius by itself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0003
rows.name: Could it be...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0004
rows.name: Elma[ST:wide ]― san?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0005
rows.name: This is bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0006
rows.name: What's bad? I don't get it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0007
rows.name: That Vasalt[ST:wide ]― it's an Overd.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0008
rows.name: Huh?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0009
rows.name: It just looks like a normal Vasalt to me, though[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0010
rows.name:
If one Simius took down three or four Vasalt,
that would be perfectly normal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0011
rows.name:
But the scene in front of us now is the reverse.
And there's no sign any other Vasalt were here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0012
rows.name: If that's the case, the answer that can explain this situation is[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0013
rows.name: is none other than that that Vasalt is an Overd.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0014
rows.name: I'll check the BLADE Report Database![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0015
rows.name:
If that Vasalt is an Overd,
there's bound to be something listed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0016
rows.name: Found it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0017
rows.name:
But its activity is reported
in an area pretty far from here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0018
rows.name:
Did it chase fleeing BLADE members here,
or is there some other reason?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0019
rows.name:
Even though an Overd is this close,
BLADE HQ isn't making any moves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0020
rows.name:
Information about places where Data Probes
haven't been installed[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0021
rows.name: can't be picked up by FrontierNet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0022
rows.name:
It must have moved out of the Segment
monitored by the Data Probe[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0023
rows.name: They must have lost track of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_JNK0010
rows.name: Confident

rows.label: xs02020170_SEL0011
rows.name: Show a fighting stance

rows.label: xs02020170_JNK0020
rows.name: Question

rows.label: xs02020170_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask what an Overd is.

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0024
rows.name: Hey hey hey hey, wait a minute please![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0025
rows.name: Calm down! We're talking about an Overd here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0026
rows.name: I hadn't taught you yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0027
rows.name:
An Overd is, among the native creatures that are threat targets for NLA,
outside the ranks[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0028
rows.name:
In other words, it's a general term for native creatures hiding
an unconventional threat, to the extent that a rank cannot be assigned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0029
rows.name:
However, it's not that they are chosen
just for being simply strong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0030
rows.name:
If they have even one threatening ability,
they qualify for the designation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0031
rows.name: An Overd is[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0032
rows.name:
among the native creatures living on Mira, it refers to native
creatures that become a threat to humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0033
rows.name:
Apparently there have been cases where
they turned out to be low-rank when actually fought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0034
rows.name: But don't get the wrong idea.[ST:wait

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0035
rows.name:
Native creatures designated as Overd are not
chosen simply for strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0036
rows.name:
If they possess even one ability that can become a threat to humanity,
they become a target for designation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0037
rows.name:
Native creatures that cause several casualties
even to teams with skill rivaling the 1st or 2nd best in BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0038
rows.name: That's an Overd.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_JNK0030
rows.name: Trust

rows.label: xs02020170_SEL0031
rows.name: Look at Lin and Elma and smile

rows.label: xs02020170_JNK0040
rows.name: Conviction

rows.label: xs02020170_SEL0041
rows.name: Gaze at NLA and clench fist tightly.

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0039
rows.name: [ST:undisp ][ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0040
rows.name: Thanks, for trusting someone like me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0041
rows.name: Elma-san, I'll do it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0042
rows.name: As long as we're going to live here,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0043
rows.name:
I think we'll run into Overds
plenty of times.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0044
rows.name: We can't just run away every time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0045
rows.name:
Besides, if we run away now and NLA suffers damage,
I'll definitely regret it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0046
rows.name:
That's right.
Let's do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0047
rows.name: You've thought this through, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0048
rows.name: Lin?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0049
rows.name: Count me in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0050
rows.name: It's about NLA too, of course, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0051
rows.name:
As long as we're going to live here,
fights with Overds can't be avoided.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0052
rows.name:
Besides, with you all here,
I'm starting to feel like we can actually take it down![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0053
rows.name: Fufu. That's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0054
rows.name: Just don't push yourselves too hard, either of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0055
rows.name:
There's nothing better than defeating it, but
even just making it retreat temporarily is enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0056
rows.name: If we install the Data Probe in the meantime,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0057
rows.name:
even if that thing approaches NLA again,
next time we can track it with FrontierNet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0058
rows.name:
Overds are different from the native creatures up to now.
Let's prepare thoroughly.[ST:wait ]
